response.original_title: The Rift: Riding Iceland's Fault Line
response.overview: Around the World cyclist Jenny Graham is joined by Ultra Endurance racer Lael Wilcox as they travel through the breathtaking landscapes of Iceland; beginning their journey at Thingvellir National Park, travelling South through Reykjadalur, and finishing their epic expedition at Grindavik. Jenny and Lael experience the incredible power of this unique Island as they ride over 100 kilometres along the Continental Divide, traverse steaming rivers, and conclude their route at the base of an active volcano. Against stunning backdrops the duo explore how the Icelandic people have harnessed their natural resources to become one of the Worldâ€™s leading self-sustaining energy producers.
response.title: The Rift: Riding Iceland's Fault Line

results.name: THE RIFT - RIDING ICELAND'S FAULT LINE
